messages.subject: Re: Sad Problem
messages.msgSnippet: I would like to be a ... Be a stand for your friend, Be a stand for a safe place for her. Listen to her. Have her document every horrible, terrible juvenile
messages.messageBody:
I would like to be a
> strength to my friend,
> rather than the low spot in her wall where all the potential
> for trying again
> to homeschool and to parent to suit her husband just floods
> out.
>
> Sandra

Be a stand for your friend, Be a stand for a safe place for
her. Listen to her. Have her document every horrible, terrible
juvenile thing he does.

You say he does little things not big ones. Little things add
up.

You and your husband could document incidents that you see
too.

Listen to the children, really let them know that they are
special and deserve to be loved.

Peace and Love in...
Barda
